resources.string:
Hi, my name is Hoelscher.

I am currently a student at University Malaysia Terengganu.
My major is Computer Science (Mobile Computing)
I like to play computer games during free time and also enjoy going outdoors sometimes.
I usually play Football Manager and Motorsport Manager games.
I also interested about cars. My favorite car is Lamborghini Aventador. 
It has a V12 engine, producing power output between 690 to 770 horsepower.
It can accelerate from 0 to 100 kilometer per hour in 3 seconds.
The top speed is 330 kmh.
